name: Spell Sisters (Shane Martin)
description:
Created During Studio 1 (Trimester 3)

What I Created:

Due to being the only programmer on the project, I created all of the functionality for the game.

Spell Sisters is a 2v2 Arena Combat game. The objective is to defeat the other team, whilst healing your own. One player per team has stronger attacks/healing but a slower fire rate. The other player on the team has a faster fire rate with weaker damage/healing.

Play Instructions:

4 Player (Xbox 360 Controllers) Only.

Controls:

Right Bumper: Dash
Left Stick: Movement
Right Stick: Look direction
Right Trigger: Cast Damage Spell
Left Trigger: Cast Healing Spell
